resources.string: We need permission to lock the screen. Just in case if you think that I am going to hack your phone, well it does not matter, you use Facebook right? You can disable whenever you want to btw!
Text to speech not available! Download now.
What the hell dude? leave me alone!
Do not touch me! i said do not!
i am sending your browser history to facebook! good luck
you have no power here my son!
